Welcome.tagline_alt: feel the ACTION, enjoy the SUMMER

Location.title: How to get to Cascais?
Location.p1: There are several ways to travel from Lisbon Airport to Cascais: train, taxi, car rental, or booking a transfer service. Just choose the option that best suits your needs, knowing that it’s only 30 km away — about 20–30 minutes from Cascais.
Location.p2_prefix: For those traveling from Porto to Cascais, the most economical and comfortable option is called
Location.p2_suffix: . This operator offers several daily services departing from Porto (Campanhã) directly to Cascais (Alcabideche) at unbeatable prices.
Location.mapAlt: Map showing route from Lisbon to Cascais
Location.taglineAlt: Feel the action, enjoy the summer

Hero.title: Volley4All
Hero.p1: Volley4All is a non-profit sports association focused on the solid development of its athletes.
Hero.p2: Over the last years we’ve achieved important results and became a reference in the south of Portugal.
Hero.p3: We believe in the power of sports to unite people and create positive change in society.
Hero.p4: We are a club PLAY HARD TRAIN HARDER
Hero.heroImageAlt: Volleyball players in action at Cascais tournament

Portugal.title: WHY PORTUGAL? WHY CASCAIS?
Portugal.p1: With a mild climate, over 300 days of sunshine per year, and 850 km of stunning beaches washed by the Atlantic Ocean, Portugal is the perfect place to enjoy unforgettable experiences all year round.
Portugal.p2: Recognized as one of Europe’s top tourist destinations and ranked in the Top 3 safest countries in the world, Portugal uniquely combines natural landscapes, cultural richness, and hospitality.
Portugal.p3: Just 2 hours by plane from major European capitals, Lisbon offers fast and convenient connections for visitors from around the world.
Portugal.p4: Cascais is located on the Atlantic coast, 30 km from Lisbon Airport — charming, safe, and perfect for our tournament.
Portugal.taglineAlt: Feel the action, enjoy the summer

portugal.title: PORTUGAL
portugal.subtitle: Lisbon
portugal.desc: One of the oldest nations in Europe, founded in 1139 with stable borders since 1297.
portugal.alt: View of Lisbon and Belém Tower

cabo.title: CABO DA ROCA
cabo.subtitle: Cascais
cabo.desc: The westernmost point of mainland Europe, marked by cliffs and breathtaking views.
cabo.alt: Cliffs and lighthouse at Cabo da Roca

boca.title: BOCA DO INFERNO
boca.subtitle: Cascais
boca.desc: A unique rock formation with cliffs sculpted by the force of the Atlantic, west of Cascais.
boca.alt: Arches and cliffs at Boca do Inferno

sec1719.title: SEC XVII | XIX
sec1719.subtitle: Cascais
sec1719.desc: Noble mansions from the 17th–19th centuries; a historic refuge of Portuguese royalty.

Villa.taglineAlt: feel the ACTION, enjoy the SUMMER
Villa.title: Cascais — The Town
Villa.p1: Cascais is a charming seaside town, famous for its picturesque beaches, elegant gardens, great food, and a relaxed, welcoming atmosphere. Here, tradition and modernity live side by side, creating an ideal setting for leisure, sport, and well-being.
Villa.p2: With numerous noble mansions from the 17th–19th centuries, Cascais is a luxury seaside resort on Lisbon’s doorstep (just 20 minutes by car) and was once a favorite refuge of Portuguese and European royalty.
Villa.p3: With excellent tourist infrastructure and high-quality services, Cascais is the perfect stage to welcome young athletes and families from around the world.
Villa.p4: Visit Cascais and enjoy the summer.

schools.title: Accommodation in Schools
schools.p1: Accommodation and meals for the delegations will be provided in the Schools of the Municipality of Cascais, namely:

list.a: Agrupamento de Escolas de Alvide | Alcabideche
list.b: Agrupamento de Escolas da Cidadela | Cascais
list.c: Agrupamento de Escolas de Cascais | Cascais
list.d: Agrupamento de Escolas IBN Mucana | Alcabideche

schools.p2:
All matches will take place in sports halls within the municipality. Between matches and accommodation, visits to the town and its magnificent beaches are within a 15–20 minute walk. Additionally, each participant will receive a 'free pass card' allowing free use of the MOBICASCAIS transport network throughout the municipality during the event. We recommend checking the official app for better use of the transport network.

Each delegation will be assigned a classroom, and all participants must bring their own sleeping bag, pillow, and mattress.

hotel.title: Accommodation in Hotels
hotel.p1: Teams wishing to stay in hotels in the region and/or requiring transportation to and from Lisbon Airport must indicate this need/preference during the online registration process and contact the Official Agents of the event in advance to ensure the best available prices. All information and contacts are available at: www.cascaisvolleycup.com

food.title: Food & Meals
food.description: The canteens will be operational from July 8th to July 12th. Meals will be served in various school canteens. For food intolerances or special dietary requirements, please contact our official agents.

checkin.label: 7 July - Tuesday
checkin.text: The check-in for all teams must take place between 15:00 and 24:00 on this day at their assigned accommodation, which will be communicated in advance by the organization.

checkout.label: 13 July - Monday
checkout.text: The check-out for all teams who request and/or need to make transfers to Lisbon Airport must be carried out by 12:00 on this day.

layDay.title: Lay Day
layDay.content: On July 10th, Friday, only the strictly necessary games will be held to ensure calendar compliance. This phase will be possible to enjoy everything our town has to offer, with the option of taking a trip to Lisbon. The exchange trip along the estuary is an unforgettable experience, passing through all the beaches of the Estoril Coast such as Belém Tower, Jerónimos Monastery, the Monument to the Discoveries, and the Cultural Center of Belém, the MAAT, among others. All this in an exchange of just 25 minutes.
layDay.note: Attention: If it is in the best interest of all participants, the organization reserves the right to change the respective program. In this case, all teams will be duly notified.

Hero.phoneAlt: Cascais Volley Cup app displayed on a mobile phone
Hero.title: THE COMPETITION
Hero.p1: The competition format will be organized according to the number of registrations, always aiming to provide the highest possible number of matches for all teams.
Hero.p2: There will be a first phase consisting of groups of 4 teams, where all play against each other and the top-ranked teams in each group qualify. Qualified teams enter a second phase of single elimination to determine rankings from 1st to 8th place, while non-qualified teams enter a second group phase to determine the remaining rankings. Each team is guaranteed a minimum of 6 matches and a maximum of 8 matches.
Hero.p3: The formation of groups, rankings, points, and match schedules for all teams will always be updated and available in the CASCAIS VOLLEY CUP app | link available at www.cascaisvolleycup.com

Hero.title: Gallery
Hero.subtitle: Download your team’s best moments.

Hero.title: Hall of Fame
Hero.intro: In the last three years, at the Cascais Volley Cup we have had the honor of welcoming numerous women’s volleyball teams from all over Portugal. In 2025, we achieved the long-awaited national representation and added the title of “international” by hosting teams from various countries. To all, a huge THANK YOU for believing and for being part of the CASCAIS VOLLEY CUP family.

Winners.description: Discover the teams that reached the podium in recent years, in each category.

RegistrationHero.title: INSCRIÇÕES

schoolAccommodation.title: ALOJAMENTO EM ESCOLAS
schoolAccommodation.description: A inscrição tem que ser feita obrigatoriamente através do site do evento seguindo as instruções que serão fornecidas no mesmo. De uma forma geral, a inscrição no CASCAIS VOLLEY CUP 2026 tem dois momentos:

earlyBird.label: EARLY BIRD
earlyBird.period: I De 1 de janeiro a 31 de março
earlyBird.details: inclui inscrição no torneio, estadia e alimentação de 8 a 12 de julho I Alojamento Escolar de ocupação múltipla (mín 10 pax – max 20 pax).

regularBird.label: REGULAR BIRD
regularBird.period: I De 1 de abril a 31 de maio
regularBird.details: inclui inscrição, estadia e alimentação de 8 a 12 de julho I Alojamento Escolar de ocupação múltipla (mín 10 pax – max 20 pax).

RegistrationHero.teamRequirements: Cada equipa deve ter um mínimo de 10 atletas inscritas, e a organização oferece a inscrição gratuita para 2 treinadores por equipa.

paymentInfo.instruction: Os pagamentos devem ser efetuados por transferência bancária para:

RegistrationHero.registrationNotice: As equipas só estarão formalmente inscritas após completado todo o processo de inscrição online. Informamos que, após a inscrição e pagamento, em caso de desistência, a organização do evento reserva o direito de não reembolsar as quantias já pagas.

hotelAccommodation.title: ALOJAMENTO EM HOTEL
hotelAccommodation.description: Equipas que desejem e/ou necessitem ficar em unidades hoteleiras da região e/ou necessitem de transporte de e para o Aeroporto de Lisboa devem comunicar com a agência de viagens oficial, a O-SPORTS. Para terem acesso aos melhores preços e a uma estadia sem percalços, todos os interessados neste serviço devem comunicar com a respetiva Agência de Viagens o mais cedo possível, preferencialmente, até final de novembro.

Footer.description: The premier volleyball tournament in beautiful Cascais, Portugal. Join us for an unforgettable sporting experience by the Atlantic coast.
